name: Cyclemore
description:
Learn to Recycle

Includes reading of guides and a helpful link to find all recycling centers near you.

Features

  • A Tutorial :O
  • Sorting of Rubbish
  • Upgrades using a Star Currency System
  • Mobile Friendly!

Music: cloud walker (colored mind.), we need to work together (artificial.music)
